# **Main references**

[Convergence of Probability measures](http://search.lib.unc.edu/search?R=UNCb2554346). Large parts of the course follow the 1968 book but we cover an assorted collection of special topics and examples. 

[Durret's Probability Theory and examples](https://services.math.duke.edu/~rtd/PTE/PTEv5a.pdf)
Fantastic treatment of the Martingale FCLT in Chapter 8. 

# **Additional Readings**

<a name="advice">
 **Advice for graduate students**
</a>

- [Aldous's review of Spin glasses by Talagrand](https://www.stat.berkeley.edu/~aldous/Misc/talagrand.pdf)
- [J. Michael's Steele's semi-random rants](http://www-stat.wharton.upenn.edu/~steele/Rants.htm)
Lots of valuable advice for graduate students.

<a name="metric">
 **Metric space fundamentals**
</a>

- [STOR BIOS Boot camp](http://storbiosbootcamp.web.unc.edu)


<a name="clt">
 **Central Limit Theorem**
</a>

- [Alan Turing and the CLT](https://www.jstor.org/stable/2974762?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents) Also has a nice description of the connections between statistics and Turing's work during World War II in breaking the German enigma machine. 
- [Nice paper on extensions of the Lindeberg technique by Chatterjee](https://projecteuclid.org/euclid.aop/1171377437) Extensions of Wigner's semi-circle law to exchangeable entries are also explored. 

<a name="stein">
 **Stein's method**
</a>

- [Nice survey of Normal approximation](https://pdfs.semanticscholar.org/d305/626ef13ca557687965a9e24e89ead0ff1fea.pdf)
- [Beautiful overview of Stein-Chen for Poisson approximation](http://www.jstor.org/stable/2245366?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents)
- [Remembering Wassily Hoeffding](https://projecteuclid.org/euclid.ss/1242049393)
- [Beautiful thesis on exchangeable pairs and concentration inequalities](https://arxiv.org/abs/math/0507526)

<a name="mom">
 **Method of moments**
</a>

- [Nice collection of worked out examples](https://www.fernuni-hagen.de/stochastik/downloads/momente.pdf)
- [A powerful example by a master of the field (Svante Janson)](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1307.6344.pdf)
